definition: the fielding position of the player on a baseball team who is expected to field balls in the left third of the outfield (looking from home plate)
details:
noun
- the fielding position of the player on a baseball team who is expected to field balls in the left third of the outfield (looking from home plate)
= synonyms: left field
- the piece of ground in the outfield on the catcher's left
= synonyms: left field
